name: P.A.W.N.S - Stronger Together
description:
PAWNS is a strategy survival game about managing futuristic soldiers in a post-apocalyptic world defending against monsters. Merge your soldiers to create the ultimate super-soldier, but you risk defending areas from the invading enemies. Or place soldiers down to add more area to your defense, but weaken your soldiers by not having enough combined soldiers.   Mean while your precious cache of resources is vulnerable, and without it, you're doomed. 

Are you up to the task?

Controls:

KeySoldier ControlsCamera ControlsWASDMoves the character when controlled
Moves the camera when not controlling a soldier
LMBShoot
Control soldier (if hovering over)ShiftExit out of the soldier being controlledSpacePlace a soldier down (Unmerge)TabMerge all soldiers (in a range) into the controlled one

You manage the shop with your mouse

** CREDITS **

Dylan Stilwell - Programming, Level Design, UI

DigitalDorian - Art, programming, UI, Audio

This game was made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 . We plan to update this game with more features and polishing in the future. This game is likely to contain bugs, if so let us know in the comments.
